verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> sent<WH7971> Nathan<WH5416> to David.<WH1732> And he came<WH935> to him, and said<WH559> to him, There were two<WH8147> men<WH582> in one<WH259> city;<WH5892> the one<WH259> rich,<WH6223> and the other<WH259> poor.<WH7326>

Then said<WH559> his servants<WH5650> to him, What<WH4100> thing<WH1697> is this<WH2088> that you have done?<WH6213> you did fast<WH6684> and weep<WH1058> for the child,<WH3206> while it was alive;<WH2416> but when<WH834> the child<WH3206> was dead,<WH4191> you did rise<WH6965> and eat<WH398> bread.<WH3899>

And he said,<WH559> While the child<WH3206> was yet<WH5750> alive,<WH2416> I fasted<WH6684> and wept:<WH1058> for I said,<WH559> Who<WH4310> can tell<WH3045> whether GOD<WH3068> will be gracious<WH2603> to me, that the child<WH3206> may live?<WH2416>
But now<WH6258> he is dead,<WH4191> why<WH4100> should I fast?<WH6684> can<WH3201> I bring<WH7725> him back<WH7725> again?<WH5750> I shall go<WH1980> to him, but he shall not return<WH7725> to me.

And David<WH1732> comforted<WH5162> Bathsheba<WH1339> his wife,<WH802> and went<WH935> in to her, and lay<WH7901> with her: and she bore<WH3205> a son,<WH1121> and he called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Solomon:<WH8010> and the LORD<WH3068> loved<WH157> him.

And Joab<WH3097> fought<WH3898> against Rabbah<WH7237> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and took<WH3920> the royal<WH4410> city.<WH5892>
And Joab<WH3097> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to David,<WH1732> and said,<WH559> I have fought<WH3898> against Rabbah,<WH7237> and have taken<WH3920> the city<WH5892> of waters.<WH4325>

And David<WH1732> gathered<WH622> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> together, and went<WH3212> to Rabbah,<WH7237> and fought<WH3898> against it, and took<WH3920> it.
